name: Role Playing Golf
description:
Help Golf save the kingdom from the evil ruler.

Made for Miz-jam #1

Features:

- 7 enemy types

- 3 unlockable skills

- 19 unique battles, including 2 final boss battles with unique enemies

- Lots of collectibles along the way

- Even more bugs to exploit

- A secret...

Made in Godot in 48 hours of development time throughout the week.

Project is available on GitHub.

Assets/code used:

kenney.nl for textures, fonts and most sound effects

Aaron Krogh - Music

Game Endeavor - Screen Shake

Gonkee - Fog
